fruits.name: apple
fruits.info: There are many types of apples. Fuji, Granny Smith, Pink Lady just to name a few.

fruits.name: avocado
fruits.guide: Gently pushing on the stem of the avocado will indicate how ripe it is. The easier it is to push in, the more ripe the friut is. You can also gently press the bottom of the avocado to gauge ripeness.

fruits.name: banana
fruits.guide: Bananas show their ripeness through the peel. Bananas will turn from green to yellow with brown spots as they become more ripe.

fruits.name: pineapple
fruits.guide: Ripe pineapples will typically have a strong sweet scent.

fruits.name: strawberry
fruits.guide: Strawberries will show ripeness through the color. The darker red the color, the sweeter the strawberry typically is.
